Springfield.Abou Ben Adhem Shrine Mosque: The Abou Ben Adhem Shrine Mosque (often known locally as "the Shrine Mosque" or simply "the Shrine") is a building of arabesque design located in downtown Springfield, Greene County, Missouri, United States. It was built in 1923 for a cost of $600,000. It is owned by the Abou Ben Adhem Shriners and is the site of many events and an annual Shrine Circus.(the aba no longer hosts a circus) The five-story building includes a large auditorium with seating for over 4,000.
